sources.title: Welcome, or No Trespassing
sources.description:
Kostya Inochkin is expelled from the pioneer camp. Not wanting to bring his grandmother to a heart attack with his early arrival, the boy secretly returns to the camp, where he goes into an "illegal position". Friends help him to remain unnoticed and take all measures so that the parent's day does not take place. After all, it is on this day that Kostinâ€™s grandmother will come to the camp ...

IMDb rating: 7.9

Year of production: 1964

Director: Klimov Elem
Writers: Nusinov Ilya, Lungin Semyon
Composers: Mikael Tariverdiev, Igor Yakushenko
Operator: Kuznetsov Anatoly
Production Designers: Blank Boris, Kamsky Vladimir

Cast: Alexei Smirnov, Evstigneev Evgeny, Lidia Smirnova, Viktor Kosykh, Arina Aleinikova, Ilya Rutberg, Yuri Bondarenko, Lida Volkova, Boris Demb, Serezha Kokorev, Igor Kryukov, Alexander Mashovets, Tatyana Prokhorova, Lyudmila Smeyan, Vyacheslav Tsarev

metadata.Plot: A satirical comedy about the excessive restrictions that children face during their vacation in a Young Pioneer camp.
metadata.Actors: Evgeniy Evstigneev, Arina Aleynikova, Ilya Rutberg
